entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:15 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
